answerText: Kokoro[10] Natsume Soseki, the author of Kokoro, also wrote a work titled I Am a [this animal] in which the title character lives with Mr. Sneeze. A collection of poems by T.S. Eliot is titled for an "old possum's book" of these animals.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 01 | 11 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: After returning home to be with his dying father, the narrator receives a suicide note from his university friend in this work. [10] Name this novel in which the narrator's friend, Sensei, recounts how he and his friend K both loved the same girl before K killed himself.
